data.title: Infor
data.meta_description: Infor Hospitality is dedicated to helping industry leaders create a scalable technology platform to unite locations and empower their teams, developing powerful multi-tenant cloud software for hotels, casinos, and restaurant organizations. We work with customers and integration partners in over 135 countries to help them achieve strategic clarity, operational efficiency, consistently superior guest experiences, and maximized revenues. In a constantly evolving industry, our customers are empowered to meet today’s challenges and be ready for future ones.
data.text:
Infor Hospitality is dedicated to helping industry leaders create a scalable technology platform to unite locations and empower their teams, developing powerful multi-tenant cloud software for hotels, casinos, and restaurant organizations. We work with customers and integration partners in over 135 countries to help them achieve strategic clarity, operational efficiency, consistently superior guest experiences, and maximized revenues. In a constantly evolving industry, our customers are empowered to meet today’s challenges and be ready for future ones.

Products by Infor

CloudSuite™ EAM

CloudSuite™ Workforce Management

EzRMS revenue management software

Hospitality Management Solution (HMS)

Infor Hospitality Price Optimizer (HPO)

Infor POS (Point of Sale)

Infor Sales & Catering

SunSystems®
